name: Zombie Lifeless Ghost: Sniper Beforehand Dead
name_original: Zombie Lifeless Ghost: Sniper Beforehand Dead
description: Zombie baneful dead ahead: 3D is one of free zombie shooting games which involves Steve, a member of a high profile killer squad, all set to be a zombie killer in a city. His main armor is a zombie assault sniper. He realizes that every zombie hunter has died from the dead zombie in the city. He realizes the only way ahead is to kill zombies in this zombie defense. Blood will be shed as he finds himself on the frontier of a zombie defense. In Zombie baneful dead ahead 3D you will be involved in a zombie kill with your assault sniper. This won’t be a walk in the park for Steve, as he has only one thing in his mind, the death of the zombie killer squad due to the zombies. Time to take revenge, crush and kill all zombies. They are your only enemy in this zombie killer game!!
